description: Describe information needed for deposit and record module.
title: CD2H Data Model v0.1.0

created_by.description: ID of user that created the deposit.
created_by.name: created_by
created_by.title: Creator

id.description: Identifier of the deposit - usually the value of corresponding 'depid'-type PID.
id.name: id
id.title: Persistent Identifier of the deposit

owners.description: Owners of the deposit (a list of user's IDs).
owners.name: owners
owners.title: Owners

pid.description: Identifier of the published record - usually the type and value of a 'recid'-type PID of the corresponding published record.
pid.name: pid

revision_id.description: ID of the RecordMetadata revision. Used for record merging.
revision_id.title: Record Revision ID

type.description: Type of the PID, corresponding to PID's 'pid_type' property.
type.title: PID Type

value.description: Value of the PID, corresponding to PID's 'pid_value' property.
value.title: PID Value

pid.title: Persistent identifier of the published record

status.description: Status of the deposit, either 'draft' or 'published'.
status.name: status
status.title: Status

source.description: Source of the term (MeSH, LCSH, User...).
source.title: Term Source
